sn35.63:1.2: Atha kho āyasmā migajālo yena bhagavā …pe…
sn35.63:1.3: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā migajālo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn35.63:1.5: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, ekavihārī hoti, kittāvatā ca pana sadutiyavihārī hotī”ti?
sn35.63:2.1: “Santi kho, migajāla, cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35.63:2.2: Tañce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
sn35.63:2.3: Tassa taṃ abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosāya tiṭṭhato uppajjati nandī.
sn35.63:2.6: Nandisaṃyojanasaṃyutto kho, migajāla, bhikkhu sadutiyavihārīti vuccati.
sn35.63:2.8: Santi kho, migajāla, jivhāviññeyyā rasā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35.63:2.9: Tañce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
sn35.63:2.10: Tassa taṃ abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosāya tiṭṭhato uppajjati nandī.
sn35.63:2.13: Nandisaṃyojanasaṃyutto kho, migajāla, bhikkhu sadutiyavihārīti vuccati.
sn35.63:2.14: Evaṃvihārī ca, migajāla, bhikkhu kiñcāpi araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevati appasaddāni appanigghosāni vijanavātāni manussarāhasseyyakāni paṭisallānasāruppāni;
sn35.63:3.1: Santi ca kho, migajāla, cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35.63:3.2: Tañce bhikkhu nābhinandati nābhivadati nājjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
sn35.63:3.3: Tassa taṃ anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosāya tiṭṭhato nandī nirujjhati.
sn35.63:3.6: Nandisaṃyojanavisaṃyutto kho, migajāla, bhikkhu ekavihārīti vuccati …pe…
sn35.63:3.7: santi ca kho, migajāla, jivhāviññeyyā rasā …pe…
sn35.63:3.8: santi ca kho, migajāla, manoviññeyyā dhammā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35.63:3.9: Tañce bhikkhu nābhinandati nābhivadati nājjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
sn35.63:3.10: Tassa taṃ anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosāya tiṭṭhato nandī nirujjhati.
sn35.63:3.13: Nandisaṃyojanavippayutto kho, migajāla, bhikkhu ekavihārīti vuccati.
sn35.63:3.14: Evaṃvihārī ca, migajāla, bhikkhu kiñcāpi gāmante viharati ākiṇṇo bhikkhūhi bhikkhunīhi upāsakehi upāsikāhi rājūhi rājamahāmattehi titthiyehi titthiyasāvakehi.
